PPLoc: Human resources data privacy policy is available on Brown-Forman's intranet.  Consumer data privacy policy is at: http://www.brown-forman.com/BF_safeHarbor_privacy/default.htm
activities: Brown-Forman processes consumer and human resources data provided by its affiliated entities and affiliate branch offices in the EU.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: human resources data and consumer data, off-line, online, manually processed
recoursemech: JAMS for consumer data; EU DPAs for human resources data
